content: In the attached picture there is an arrow pointing left (replied) and a green one pointing right (forwarded). There's a similar display in Table View. But sometimes the arrows don't appear. In those cases, Ctrl+Shift+O to open the message in conversation to see the received and sent messages in the thread.
creator: sfhowes

content: According to https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/141.0/system-requirements/ it will work in Windows 10 and later... so yes.
